import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent { @Output() addProductModal = new EventEmitter(); newProductForm = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl(''), description: new FormControl(''), }); }
